cast: Cast : Aamir Khan, Sakshi Tanwar, Fatima Sana Shaikh, Sanya Malhotra
movie_description: Summary : Former wrestler Mahavir Singh Phogat and his two wrestler daughters struggle towards glory at the Commonwealth Games in the face of societal oppression.

cast: Cast : Mohammad Amir Naji, Amir Farrokh Hashemian, Bahare Seddiqi, Nafise Jafar-Mohammadi
movie_description: Summary : After a boy loses his sister's pair of shoes, he goes on a series of adventures in order to find them. When he can't, he tries a new way to "win" a new pair.

cast: Cast : Farhan Akhtar, Deepak Singh Rawat, Japtej Singh, Divya Dutta
movie_description: Summary : The truth behind the ascension of Milkha Singh, who was scarred by of the India-Pakistan partition.

cast: Cast : Irrfan Khan, Mahie Gill, Rajesh Abhay, Hemendra Dandotiya
movie_description: Summary : The story of Paan Singh Tomar, an Indian athlete and seven-time national steeplechase champion who becomes one of the most feared dacoits in Chambal Valley after his retirement.

cast: Cast : Sylvester Stallone, Talia Shire, Burt Young, Carl Weathers
movie_description: Summary : A small-time Philadelphia boxer gets a supremely rare chance to fight the world heavyweight champion in a bout in which he strives to go the distance for his self-respect.

cast: Cast : Matt Damon, Christian Bale, Jon Bernthal, Caitríona Balfe
movie_description: Summary : American car designer Carroll Shelby and driver Ken Miles battle corporate interference and the laws of physics to build a revolutionary race car for Ford in order to defeat Ferrari at the 24 Hours of Le Mans in 1966.

cast: Cast : Robert De Niro, Cathy Moriarty, Joe Pesci, Frank Vincent
movie_description: Summary : The life of boxer Jake LaMotta, whose violence and temper that led him to the top in the ring destroyed his life outside of it.

cast: Cast : Tom Hardy, Nick Nolte, Joel Edgerton, Jennifer Morrison
movie_description: Summary : The youngest son of an alcoholic former boxer returns home, where he's trained by his father for competition in a mixed martial arts tournament - a path that puts the fighter on a collision course with his estranged, older brother.

cast: Cast : Daniel Brühl, Chris Hemsworth, Olivia Wilde, Alexandra Maria Lara
movie_description: Summary : The merciless 1970s rivalry between Formula One rivals James Hunt and Niki Lauda.

cast: Cast : Hilary Swank, Clint Eastwood, Morgan Freeman, Jay Baruchel
movie_description: Summary : Frankie, an ill-tempered old coach, reluctantly agrees to train aspiring boxer Maggie. Impressed with her determination and talent, he helps her become the best and the two soon form a close bond.

movie_name: Title : Lagaan: Once Upon a Time in India
cast: Cast : Aamir Khan, Raghubir Yadav, Gracy Singh, Rachel Shelley
movie_description: Summary : The people of a small village in Victorian India stake their future on a game of cricket against their ruthless British rulers.

cast: Cast : Shah Rukh Khan, Vidya Malvade, Sagarika Ghatge, Shilpa Shukla
movie_description: Summary : Kabir Khan, the coach of the Indian Women's National Hockey Team, dreams of making his all-girls team emerge victorious against all odds.

cast: Cast : Paul Newman, Jackie Gleason, Piper Laurie, George C. Scott
movie_description: Summary : An up-and-coming pool player plays a long-time champion in a single high-stakes match.

cast: Cast : Russell Crowe, Renée Zellweger, Craig Bierko, Paul Giamatti
movie_description: Summary : The story of James J. Braddock, a supposedly washed-up boxer who came back to challenge for the heavyweight championship of the world.

movie_name: Title : M.S. Dhoni: The Untold Story
cast: Cast : Sushant Singh Rajput, Kiara Advani, Anupam Kher, Disha Patani
movie_description: Summary : The untold story of Mahendra Singh Dhoni's journey from ticket collector to trophy collector - the world-cup-winning captain of the Indian Cricket Team.

cast: Cast : Mickey Rourke, Marisa Tomei, Evan Rachel Wood, Mark Margolis
movie_description: Summary : A faded professional wrestler must retire, but finds his quest for a new life outside the ring a dispiriting struggle.

cast: Cast : Tom Guiry, Mike Vitar, Art LaFleur, Patrick Renna
movie_description: Summary : In the summer of 1962, a new kid in town is taken under the wing of a young baseball prodigy and his rowdy team, resulting in many adventures.

cast: Cast : Denzel Washington, Will Patton, Wood Harris, Ryan Hurst
movie_description: Summary : The true story of a newly appointed African-American coach and his high school team on their first season as a racially integrated unit.

cast: Cast : Mark Wahlberg, Christian Bale, Amy Adams, Melissa Leo
movie_description: Summary : Based on the story of Micky Ward, a fledgling boxer who tries to escape the shadow of his more famous but troubled older boxing brother and get his own shot at greatness.

cast: Cast : Anthony Hopkins, Diane Ladd, Iain Rea, Tessa Mitchell
movie_description: Summary : The story of New Zealander Burt Munro, who spent years rebuilding a 1920 Indian motorcycle, which helped him set the land speed world record at Utah's Bonneville Salt Flats in 1967.

cast: Cast : Amit Sadh, Sushant Singh Rajput, Rajkummar Rao, Amrita Puri
movie_description: Summary : Three friends growing up in India at the turn of the millennium set out to open a training academy to produce the country's next cricket stars.

cast: Cast : Michèle Caucheteux, Jean-Claude Donda, Michel Robin, Monica Viegas
movie_description: Summary : When her grandson is kidnapped during the Tour de France, Madame Souza and her beloved pooch Bruno team up with the Belleville Sisters--an aged song-and-dance team from the days of Fred Astaire--to rescue him.

cast: Cast : Brad Pitt, Robin Wright, Jonah Hill, Philip Seymour Hoffman
movie_description: Summary : Oakland A's general manager Billy Beane's successful attempt to assemble a baseball team on a lean budget by employing computer-generated analysis to acquire new players.

cast: Cast : Michael B. Jordan, Sylvester Stallone, Tessa Thompson, Phylicia Rashad
movie_description: Summary : The former World Heavyweight Champion Rocky Balboa serves as a trainer and mentor to Adonis Johnson, the son of his late friend and former rival Apollo Creed.

cast: Cast : Quinton Aaron, Sandra Bullock, Tim McGraw, Jae Head
movie_description: Summary : The story of Michael Oher, a homeless and traumatized boy who became an All-American football player and first-round NFL draft pick with the help of a caring woman and her family.

cast: Cast : Denzel Washington, Vicellous Shannon, Deborah Kara Unger, Liev Schreiber
movie_description: Summary : The story of Rubin 'Hurricane' Carter, a boxer wrongly imprisoned for murder, and the people who aided in his fight to prove his innocence.

cast: Cast : Sean Astin, Jon Favreau, Ned Beatty, Greta Lind
movie_description: Summary : Rudy has always been told that he was too small to play college football. But he is determined to overcome the odds and fulfill his dream of playing for Notre Dame.

cast: Cast : Margot Robbie, Sebastian Stan, Allison Janney, Julianne Nicholson
movie_description: Summary : Competitive ice skater Tonya Harding rises amongst the ranks at the U.S. Figure Skating Championships, but her future in the activity is thrown into doubt when her ex-husband intervenes.

cast: Cast : Will Smith, Aunjanue Ellis-Taylor, Jon Bernthal, Saniyya Sidney
movie_description: Summary : A look at how tennis superstars Venus and Serena Williams became who they are after the coaching from their father Richard Williams.

cast: Cast : Kevin Costner, James Earl Jones, Ray Liotta, Amy Madigan
movie_description: Summary : Iowa farmer Ray Kinsella is inspired by a voice he can't ignore to pursue a dream he can hardly believe. Supported by his wife, Ray begins the quest by turning his ordinary cornfield into a place where dreams can come true.

cast: Cast : Chadwick Boseman, T.R. Knight, Harrison Ford, Nicole Beharie
movie_description: Summary : In 1947, Jackie Robinson becomes the first African-American to play in Major League Baseball in the modern era when he was signed by the Brooklyn Dodgers and faces considerable racism in the process.

movie_name: Title : The Art of Racing in the Rain
cast: Cast : Kevin Costner, Milo Ventimiglia, Jackie Minns, Marcus Hondro
movie_description: Summary : Through his bond with his owner, aspiring Formula One race car driver Denny, golden retriever Enzo learns that the techniques needed on the racetrack can also be used to successfully navigate the journey of life.

movie_description: Summary : Traces the journey of a suburban family - led by a well-intentioned but domineering father - as they navigate love, forgiveness, and coming together in the aftermath of a loss.

cast: Cast : Jean-Marc Barr, Jean Reno, Rosanna Arquette, Paul Shenar
movie_description: Summary : The rivalry between Enzo and Jacques, two childhood friends and now world-renowned free divers, becomes a beautiful and perilous journey into oneself and the unknown.

cast: Cast : Ranveer Singh, Deepika Padukone, Tahir Raj Bhasin, Jiiva
movie_description: Summary : On June 25, 1983, the Lord's Cricket Ground witnessed 14 men beat the two times World Champions West Indies, putting India back onto the cricket world stage.

cast: Cast : Colm Meaney, Henry Goodman, David Roper, Jimmy Reddington
movie_description: Summary : The story of the controversial Brian Clough's 44-day reign as the coach of the English football club Leeds United.

cast: Cast : Matt Damon, Jason Bateman, Ben Affleck, Chris Messina
movie_description: Summary : Follows the history of sports marketing executive Sonny Vaccaro, and how he led Nike in its pursuit of the greatest athlete in the history of basketball, Michael Jordan.

cast: Cast : Jessica Chastain, Idris Elba, Kevin Costner, Michael Cera
movie_description: Summary : The true story of Molly Bloom, an Olympic-class skier who ran the world's most exclusive high-stakes poker game and became an FBI target.

cast: Cast : Elijah Wood, Charlie Hunnam, Claire Forlani, Marc Warren
movie_description: Summary : A wrongfully expelled Harvard undergrad moves to London, where he is introduced to the violent underworld of football hooliganism.

cast: Cast : Robert Redford, Robert Duvall, Glenn Close, Kim Basinger
movie_description: Summary : A middle-aged unknown comes seemingly out of nowhere to become a legendary baseball player with almost supernatural talent.

cast: Cast : Kurt Russell, Patricia Clarkson, Nathan West, Noah Emmerich
movie_description: Summary : The true story of Herb Brooks, the player-turned-coach who led the 1980 U.S. Olympic hockey team to victory over the seemingly invincible Soviet squad.

cast: Cast : Matthias Schweighöfer, Ali Suliman, Ahmed Malek, James Krishna Floyd
movie_description: Summary : From war-torn Syria to the 2016 Rio Olympics, two young sisters embark on a harrowing journey as refugees, putting both their hearts and champion swimming skills to heroic use.

cast: Cast : Kevin Costner, Maria Bello, Ramiro Rodriguez, Carlos Pratts
movie_description: Summary : Jim White moves his family after losing his last job as a football coach, and at his new school he turns seven disappointing students into one of the best cross-country teams in the region.

cast: Cast : Gene Hackman, Barbara Hershey, Dennis Hopper, Sheb Wooley
movie_description: Summary : A coach with a checkered past and a local drunk train a small-town high school basketball team to become a top contender for the state championship in 1950s Indiana.

movie_name: Title : The Greatest Game Ever Played
cast: Cast : Shia LaBeouf, Stephen Dillane, Elias Koteas, James Paxton
movie_description: Summary : In the 1913 U.S. Open, twenty-year-old Francis Ouimet played golf against his idol, 1900 U.S. Open champion, Englishman Harry Vardon.

cast: Cast : Joe Mantegna, Ben Kingsley, Max Pomeranc, Joan Allen
movie_description: Summary : A prepubescent chess prodigy is encouraged to harden himself in order to become a champion like the famous but unlikable Bobby Fischer.

cast: Cast : Amitabh Bachchan, Ankush Gedam, Babu Kshatriya, Jerico Robert
movie_description: Summary : Based on the life of Vijay Barse, a retired sports teacher who founded an NGO called Slum Soccer. He managed to rehabilitate street kids by keeping them off drugs and crime by turning them into soccer players and building a whole team.

cast: Cast : Ralph Macchio, Pat Morita, Elisabeth Shue, Martin Kove
movie_description: Summary : A martial arts master agrees to teach karate to a bullied teenager.

movie_name: Title : A League of Their Own
cast: Cast : Tom Hanks, Geena Davis, Lori Petty, Madonna
movie_description: Summary : Two sisters join the first female professional baseball league and struggle to help it succeed amid their own growing rivalry.

cast: Cast : Tom Cruise, Cuba Gooding Jr., Renée Zellweger, Kelly Preston
movie_description: Summary : When a sports agent has a moral epiphany and is fired for expressing it, he decides to put his new philosophy to the test as an independent agent with the only athlete who stays with him and his former colleague.
